abstract: A new book by former Lehman Brothers vice-president Patrick G. McDonald is among the first from an insider and is the front-runner on the subject of the firm, BusinessWeek writes in a review.
snippet: A new book by former Lehman Brothers vice-president Patrick G. McDonald is among the first from an insider and is the front-runner on the subject of the firm, BusinessWeek writes in a review.
lead_paragraph: A new book by a former Lehman Brothers vice-president, Patrick G. McDonald, is among the first to describe the collapse of the investment bank as seen from the inside.

headline.main: Insider’s Tale of Lehman Demise May Spur Sympathy
